Title: H1 2025: Robust results despite volatile environment
Summary: Throughout the first half of the year, inventory corrections in our markets have progressed. Order intake and sales continuously improved over the same period with slightly positive sales growth in the second quarter. The operational EBITA margin continued to improve in the first half and reached 11.5% in the second quarter, in line with expectations.

Title: Danfoss SLP13-10 cartridge valve enhances hydraulic efficiency and productivity
Summary: With its low electric power consumption, the SLP13-10 valve helps improve efficiency, reduce operational costs, and enhance system performance.

Title: Danfoss nozzle spray technology elevates automotive paint quality
Summary: Danfoss Spray Technology Boosts Automotive Paint Quality

Title: Danfoss Power Solutions completes UQDB coupling portfolio, offering high efficiency and reliability in data center liquid cooling applications
Summary: Offering direct connection between servers and manifolds in data center liquid cooling applications, Danfoss' UQDB coupling is Open Compute Project compliant. The complete portfolio now includes -02, -04, -06, and -08 sizes.

Title: New Airflex Failsafe Caliper Brake from Danfoss maximizes safety, durability, and serviceability in demanding applications
Summary: The Airflex ACB-F3 Failsafe Caliper Brake is a spring-applied, hydraulically released brake. A new solution for park-and-hold or emergency stop applications, the Airflex ACB-F3 is ideal for the oil and gas, mining, marine, processing, and metals industries.

Title: Danfoss introduces Thorx CLM 5 C cam lobe motor, a breakthrough in efficiency and performance for road rollers
Summary: The CLM 5 C motor features a robust, novel design that eliminates leakage, enables smoother road finishing, reduces service issues, and extends component lifetime.
